alternative_title: Find the right number, email or postal address to contact the DVLA
body:
$!There are different contact details for the DVLA depending on your enquiry. $!

^Check the [driving section](/browse/driving "Driving on GOV.UK") first to see if your question is answered there.^

##General information

You can use the following information or the [use the online service](https://emaildvla.direct.gov.uk/emaildvla/cegemail/dvla/en/index.html "Contact the DVLA"){:rel="external"} to contact the DVLA.

$C 
**Driver Licensing Enquiries**

**Telephone:** 0300 790 6801   
**Textphone:** 0300 123 1278   
**Fax:** 0300 123 0784   
**Fax from outside the UK:** +44 (0)1792 786 369  
Monday to Friday 8am to 7pm  
Saturday 8am to 2pm   
$C

$A
Drivers Customer Services
Correspondence Team
DVLA
Swansea
SA6 7JL
$A

##Driver Check Service

Hire car companies can contact the **Driver Check Service** to check the licence of someone hiring a car. The driver must give their permission for the check.

$C
**Driver Check Service**  

09061 393 837  
Calls charged at 49p a minute
$C

##Driving and medical issues

$C
**Drivers Medical Enquiries**

**Telephone:** 0300 790 6806 (car or motorcycle), 0300 790 6807 (bus, coach or lorry)  
**Fax:** 0845 850 0095  
Monday to Friday 8am to 5:30pm  
Saturday 8am to 1:00pm
$C

$A
Drivers Medical Enquiries
DVLA
Swansea
SA99 1TU
$A

##Registration and tax

You can use the following information or the [use the online service](https://emaildvla.direct.gov.uk/emaildvla/cegemail/dvla/en/index.html "Contact the DVLA"){:rel="external"} to contact the DVLA.

$C
**Vehicle Registration and Tax enquiries**

**Telephone:** 0300 790 6802  
**Text phone:** 0300 123 1279  
**Fax:** 0300 123 0798  
Monday to Friday 8am to 7pm  
Saturday 8am to 2pm
$C

$A
Vehicle Customer Services
DVLA
Swansea
SA99 1AR
$A

##DVLA local offices

You can also contact your [nearest DVLA local office](/dvla-offices "Find your nearest DVLA office").

^DVLA local offices and the contact centre are closed on [public holidays](/bank-holidays "Public holidays").^

*[DVLA]: Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency
overview: Find the right number, email or address to contact the DVLA about driving licences, vehicle tax, vehicle registration
title: Contact the DVLA
